translation.en: [Tia] Hey, girl.
translation.zh: 嘿 小姑娘

translation.en: They reek. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 好臭

translation.en: [Tia] Do you have her shoes?
translation.zh: 找到她的鞋了吗？

translation.en: [Nu'u] I thought I was done with football.
translation.zh: 我以为我不会再打橄榄球了

translation.en: And then I was just working at Walmart.
translation.zh: 我就在沃尔玛上班

translation.en: Just making minimum wage.
translation.zh: 领着最低薪水

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I was just checking receipts at the door...
translation.zh: 我站在门口查小票…

translation.en: Big old dude, checking receipts, like...
translation.zh: 大个子老哥 查小票

translation.en: I was just, like, "Man, I don't wanna keep doing this."
translation.zh: 我心想：“我不想一直干这个”

translation.en: That's when I came to Laney. I just showed up one day.
translation.zh: 我就是那个时候去了兰尼 有一天就那么去了

translation.en: [Rejzohn] I wake up at 5:30, leave by 6:00,
translation.zh: 我早上5点半起床 6点出门

translation.en: drive two hours every morning with traffic.
translation.zh: 每天早上在拥挤的交通中开2个小时

translation.en: And then get to Laney, start class, practice,
translation.zh: 然后到达兰尼 开始上课、练习

translation.en: and then come home, lay down, go to sleep, wake up and do it all over again.
translation.zh: 再回家 躺下睡觉 醒来 周而复始

translation.en: Every day.
translation.zh: 每天如此

translation.en: But, I mean, this is something I gotta do so I can have a better future for myself.
translation.zh: 但这是我必须做的 这样才能拥有更好的未来

translation.en: [Dior] I'm out here again, left in the cold.
translation.zh: 我又身处这种寒冷的环境

translation.en: It's that feeling I hate 'cause it makes me feel weak.
translation.zh: 这是我讨厌的感觉 让我觉得软弱

translation.en: And I hate feeling weak. I felt weak for so long.
translation.zh: 我讨厌软弱 过去已经软弱了太久

translation.en: I can do this myself, too. I don't need no handouts.
translation.zh: 我自己也可以做到 我不需要施舍

translation.en: It can get frustrating at times 'cause you don't know what's gonna happen.
translation.zh: 有时候是会觉得沮丧 因为不知道未来会如何

translation.en: I need to get the fuck up outta here.
translation.zh: 我得离开这鬼地方

translation.en: [RJ] I just graduated high school and I don't have any money,
translation.zh: 我刚高中毕业 没有钱

translation.en: I don't have any scholarship offers.
translation.zh: 没拿到任何奖学金

translation.en: I was like, "Maybe I should just join the military."
translation.zh: 我想着：“要不去参军吧”

translation.en: So, I was like, "No, fuck this. I'm gonna go play football."
translation.zh: 但又想：“不行 我要打橄榄球”

translation.en: I fit in 'cause I work my ass off.
translation.zh: 我很合适 因为我拼命努力

translation.en: And that's what we do at Laney, we work our asses off.
translation.zh: 在兰尼就是这样 我们拼命努力训练

translation.en: [Brad] You hear about the tough grind of JUCO football.
translation.zh: 人们都听说过大专橄榄球的残酷磨炼

translation.en: Laney College is the tough grind of JUCO football.
translation.zh: （兰尼学院） 兰尼学院就是 大专橄榄球的残酷磨练场

translation.en: [man 1] The California junior college system is different.
translation.zh: 加州的大专体系有所不同

translation.en: There aren't scholarships, there aren't dorms.
translation.zh: 没有奖学金 没有宿舍

translation.en: [Brad] They have to find their own housing, which can be very pricey in California.
translation.zh: 他们得自己找地方住 在加州这很贵

translation.en: I mean, if you can't afford $3,000 worth of rent around here, it's rough.
translation.zh: 如果在这里你付不起三千美金的房租 那就很艰难了

translation.en: [Vince] Guys used to sleep in the locker room
translation.zh: 我们以前有学生睡在更衣室

translation.en: and we didn't even know it.
translation.zh: 大家都不知道

translation.en: I got some guys that didn't eat for two days.
translation.zh: 我有些学生两天都不吃饭

translation.en: [Adam] There's dudes on this team that are coming from nothing.
translation.zh: 还有队员来之前一无所有

translation.en: If you weren't playing football, you wouldn't be going to college at all.
translation.zh: 如果不打橄榄球 根本不能上大专

translation.en: [Josh] Just love the gritty, grindy-type players, and that's what we get.
translation.zh: 我就喜欢这种坚韧、努力的球员 我们这的球员都是如此

translation.en: [man 2] The working-class kids are the tough kids.
translation.zh: 工薪阶层的孩子 就是那种更坚强的小孩

translation.en: Can't play this game and not be tough.
translation.zh: 不坚强就打不了这种比赛

translation.en: [man 3] With community college, you got kids having kids.
translation.zh: 在社区大专院校 有的学生有孩子

translation.en: You gotta worry about housing, eating, academics.
translation.zh: 要同时操心住房、吃饭和学业

translation.en: [Josh] If we don't take care of business, they're not gonna get out.
translation.zh: 如果我们不做好工作 他们就无法离开这里

translation.en: They're gonna be here working at AutoZone.
translation.zh: 他们会在这里的汽配店上班

translation.en: [man 1] Those guys that have the spirit to maybe sleep in their car
translation.zh: 那些能够天天睡在车里

translation.en: to play football, they're gonna make it.
translation.zh: 坚持打橄榄球的人 一定能成功

translation.en: They're gonna go on to make something of themselves
translation.zh: 他们会走上实现自我的道路

translation.en: because you have to be a bit resourceful.
translation.zh: 因为这靠的就是解决问题的能力

translation.en: You have to figure things out on your own.
translation.zh: 你得自己想办法

translation.en: They have to try harder, and that's Oakland.
translation.zh: 他们要加倍努力 这就是奥克兰

translation.en: [commentator 1] It all comes down to this last play.
translation.zh: （2018年12月8日 加州社区大学锦标赛） 终于来到这最后一次进攻

translation.en: It must go into the end zone.
translation.zh: 一定要进入球门区

translation.en: [commentator 2] What a game, Jason, I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 比赛真精彩 杰森 我说真的

translation.en: Laney came out of nowhere. It was a real surprise.
translation.zh: 兰尼是匹黑马 让人惊喜

translation.en: [commentator 1] No one thought the team from Oakland had a shot.
translation.zh: 没人想到奥克兰来的球队有机会获胜

translation.en: Last play!
translation.zh: 最后一次进攻！

translation.en: Dolman... is gonna run.
translation.zh: 道曼…要跑动了

translation.en: [commentator 1] That's it!
translation.zh: 就是这样！

translation.en: The Laney College Eagles are the 2018 State Champions!
translation.zh: 兰尼学院老鹰队 获得2018州冠军！

translation.en: [Brad] Laney was one of the great stories last year.
translation.zh: 兰尼的胜利是去年最棒的故事之一

translation.en: An amazing story.
translation.zh: 非常棒的故事

translation.en: Laney was not a very good football program 10, 15 years ago,
translation.zh: （《大专橄榄球》出版人 布拉德荷赛斯） 兰尼的橄榄球项目 在10到15年前没有特别好

translation.en: but Coach Beam has built a program from the ground level up.
translation.zh: 但比姆教练从零打造了一个项目

translation.en: John Beam's a heck of a football coach.
translation.zh: 约翰比姆是个非常棒的橄榄球教练

translation.en: [commentator 1] Tell us about the philosophy
translation.zh: 来说说比姆教练

translation.en: Coach Beam preached all season to get you here.
translation.zh: 一整个赛季把队伍带到这个位置 所宣扬的理念

translation.en: Only team that could beat us is us.
translation.zh: 能打败我们队伍的只有我们自己

translation.en: He made sure that we was ready to play,
translation.zh: 他确保我们都已为比赛做好准备

translation.en: but he always told us it wasn't him, it was us.
translation.zh: 但他总是对我们说 做准备的是我们 不是他

translation.en: Man, he's a great coach.
translation.zh: 老天 他真是个好教练

translation.en: One of the best coaches I ever had. I love Coach Beam.
translation.zh: 我遇到过最好的教练之一 我爱比姆教练

translation.en: [commentator 3] Congratulations to the 2018
translation.zh: 祝贺2018年

translation.en: CCA state champions, the Laney College Eagles.
translation.zh: CCA州冠军 兰尼学院老鹰队

translation.en: [Coach Beam] I didn't know what to do.
translation.zh: 我当时不知道该做什么

translation.en: I started running like a crazy guy around the field.
translation.zh: 我开始像疯子一样在场上奔跑

translation.en: Jump on my DB coach...
translation.zh: 跳到我们防守后卫教练的身上…

translation.en: change my direction, ran up into the stand,
translation.zh: 又变换方向 跑到看台上

translation.en: because I wanted to find my wife. I wanted to find my family.
translation.zh: 因为我想找我妻子 找到我的家人

translation.en: You do something for 40 years...
translation.zh: 一件事坚持做40年

translation.en: something you love...
translation.zh: 又是自己热爱的事

translation.en: I put in hours of time on the field every day with everybody else's kids...
translation.zh: 我每天长时间和别人的孩子 在球场上待着

translation.en: And so, for me, I ran up to the field, found my wife, hugged her, my daughters.
translation.zh: 所以我跑到场边 找到我的妻子 拥抱她和我的女儿们

translation.en: And, you know...
translation.zh: 要知道…

translation.en: football is about family.
translation.zh: （年度教练 约翰比姆） …橄榄球讲究的就是家人纽带

translation.en: So every year, everything starts over again, a whole new family.
translation.zh: 每年 一切都要重新开始 一个全新的家庭 （兰尼学院 州冠军-2018）

translation.en: Give me one, ready, ready.
translation.zh: 来一次 准备好

translation.en: -Give me two, ready, ready. -[group claps]
translation.zh: 来两次 准备好

translation.en: Today...
translation.zh: 今天

translation.en: is my 40th year starting coaching football.
translation.zh: 是我执教橄榄球的第40年

translation.en: So I've been doing it 40 years.
translation.zh: 我已经干了40年了

translation.en: I'm as excited today as I was in 1979.
translation.zh: 但我今天和1979年的我一样兴奋

translation.en: Last year, phenomenal season, magic ride.
translation.zh: 去年是个一举成名的赛季 出奇制胜

translation.en: Those that you were there,
translation.zh: 你们有人亲身经历

translation.en: remember that feeling when the clock ran out,
translation.zh: 记得时钟倒数时

translation.en: the quarterback ran, we tackled him, right, Ryan?
translation.zh: 四分卫跑动 我们拦截了他 对吗 莱恩？

translation.en: How did it feel? Unbelievable, right, Baras?
translation.zh: 感觉如何？难以置信吧 巴拉斯？

translation.en: -You've never done that before. -[Barasa] No.
translation.zh: -你从没那样做过 -是的

translation.en: -Never. -[Barasa] Never.
translation.zh: -从来没有 -从来没有

translation.en: [Coach Beam] It's great, that feeling, but you gotta make it come back.
translation.zh: 那种感觉很棒 但你得找回它

translation.en: It's gonna be fun today, man.
translation.zh: （66号 攻击线锋 努道加瓦） 今天会很有趣的 伙计

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Kenny, why is your chin strap not buttoned?
translation.zh: 肯尼 你的下颚搭扣为什么没扣上？

translation.en: Kenny, why is it the same thing every day with you, my man?
translation.zh: 肯尼 为什么每天都这样 老兄？

translation.en: Come on, young fella.
translation.zh: 拜托 年轻人

translation.en: -How are you, sir? How you feeling? -[Dior] Good.
translation.zh: -你好吗 先生？怎么样？ -很好

translation.en: -Good. Amazing, Coach. -All right.
translation.zh: -好极了 教练 -好的 （4号 外接手 迪奥沃克斯科特）

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Come on, Kenny.
translation.zh: 拜托 肯尼

translation.en: You have all the ability in the world and your chin strap's still not buttoned.
translation.zh: 你什么能力都有 但就是不扣你的下颚搭扣

translation.en: [Kenny] My bad.
translation.zh: 是我的错

translation.en: [player] Need a crowd. Kind of empty right now.
translation.zh: 得有观众 现在有点空

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Let's go. We're right here, boys. Let's go!
translation.zh: 来吧 我们开始了 小伙子们

translation.en: Today, we're letting it loose.
translation.zh: 今天我们放开打

translation.en: Let it go. Don't over think it right now. Just play.
translation.zh: 放手去发挥 现在不要多想 只管打就行

translation.en: We'll correct the mistakes tomorrow, right, Timmy?
translation.zh: 我们明天再纠正错误 对吧 提米？

translation.en: But today, get off the ball, have fun and be violent.
translation.zh: 今天就放开球好好享受 释放暴力

translation.en: Show us what you can do today. Here we go, one clap, ready.
translation.zh: 今天让我们看看你们的本事 来吧 拍一下 准备好

translation.en: -[Coach Beam] Get a break, boys. -[cheering]
translation.zh: 去享受这个机会吧 孩子们

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Let's go, let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: [Vince] We don't have the luxury of having the same team that we had last year.
translation.zh: 我们没法奢求和去年拥有相同的队伍

translation.en: This is a whole new team and each year you're developing kids
translation.zh: 这是个全新的队伍 每年都要训练孩子们 （外线卫教练 文思波德隆）

translation.en: to be great. But right now, we're just average.
translation.zh: （外线卫教练 文思波德隆） 成长为优秀的球员 但现在他们还很平庸

translation.en: We're not great yet.
translation.zh: 我们还没有变得优秀

translation.en: It's RJ, coach, RJ! Close enough.
translation.zh: 放开 伙计们 好样的

translation.en: Let's go, O.
translation.zh: 走吧 O

translation.en: We only returned 22 players.
translation.zh: 我们只有22名球员回归

translation.en: D-line wise, we got two guys returning.
translation.zh: 防守线锋回来了两个人

translation.en: We're trying to mesh 90 different individuals.
translation.zh: 我们要努力让90个不同的个体 相互配合

translation.en: Ninety individuals that you're trying to make units.
translation.zh: 90个人要在你的指导下 成为团队的一员

translation.en: If we can overcome that, we'll have a chance to be good.
translation.zh: 如果我们能克服这一点 就有机会成为好球队

translation.en: Nice job, AJ. Good job.
translation.zh: 做得好 AJ

translation.en: It's RJ, coach, RJ! My... Close enough.
translation.zh: 是RJ 教练 RJ！差一点就对了

translation.en: God damn it. Get it together! We gotta be faster than this, guys.
translation.zh: 该死 打起精神！ 现在不够快 伙计们

translation.en: Quarterback situation's a bit hairy right now.
translation.zh: 四分卫有点吓人 （外接手教练 亚当罗宾森）

translation.en: Carson is a prototypical NFL quarterback.
translation.zh: 卡森是个典型的橄榄球联盟四分卫

translation.en: Naturally spins the ball.
translation.zh: （13号 四分卫 卡森亚拉特） 自然地转球

translation.en: Carson's got a bicep tendonitis problem right now.
translation.zh: 卡森的二头肌有肌腱炎 （四分卫教练 罗伯特克罗利）

translation.en: But we still think he's gonna be really good.
translation.zh: 但我们依然认为他会成为好球员

translation.en: KJ's probably the most versatile
translation.zh: （12号 四分卫 肯尼KJ加德纳） KJ可能是最全能的

translation.en: with the ability to run and throw, make guys miss.
translation.zh: 他能跑能投 会让别人丢球

translation.en: [man] Never even looked down field.
translation.zh: 永远不要低头看球场

translation.en: [Coach Beam] KJ's a wildcard.
translation.zh: KJ是个万能球员

translation.en: You gotta think about catch the ball, nest the ball, roll.
translation.zh: （3号 四分卫 莱恩麦齐） 你得想着接球、护球、滚动

translation.en: [man] Ryan was our wily veteran for sure.
translation.zh: 莱恩绝对算是我们经验丰富的老队员

translation.en: Third year in college, second year with the program.
translation.zh: 大专三年级 参加球队第二年

translation.en: When Ryan goes in the game, there's not gonna be a surprise.
translation.zh: 莱恩一上场 就不会有意外

translation.en: We have a lot of faith in him. [Coach Beam] There he is! Got him, nice catch!
translation.zh: -我觉得我们很信任他 -他在这！抓住他 拦得好！

translation.en: It's gonna be a new challenge,
translation.zh: 这会是新的挑战

translation.en: but we have some big-time players to make the difference.
translation.zh: 但我们有一流的球员 会有非凡的表现

translation.en: So for instance, Rej.
translation.zh: 比如雷吉

translation.en: What we had, six plays?
translation.zh: 怎么样了 我们第六次进攻？

translation.en: So bogus.
translation.zh: 好假

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Rejzohn, he is a natural corner.
translation.zh: 雷吉曾是个天生的角卫

translation.en: They gotta throw a perfect ball every time.
translation.zh: 他们每次都得投出完美的球

translation.en: He's 6'3", he's got a phenomenal competitive nature about him.
translation.zh: 他身高1米9 有极具竞争力的天赋

translation.en: Tell him to throw the ball. Tell them to throw the ball.
translation.zh: 让他投球 让他们投球

translation.en: He could be a Sunday player.
translation.zh: 他可以成为周日球员

translation.en: [Josh] His brother went to Oregon State after one year with us.
translation.zh: 他的哥哥在我们这待了一年后 去了俄勒冈州立大学

translation.en: [Rejzohn] Get up.
translation.zh: 起来

translation.en: He's better than his brother.
translation.zh: 他比哥哥更强 （防守协调员 乔什拉莫斯）

translation.en: [player] Come on!
translation.zh: 快！

translation.en: Here now, here now, here now!
translation.zh: 这边！

translation.en: [Rejzohn] Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: [Rejzohn yelling] Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: [player] Fuckin' talk.
translation.zh: 胡说八道

translation.en: [Vince] His ass is so cocky right now.
translation.zh: 他现在太骄傲了

translation.en: It's gonna be a lot of jaw jacking, lot of chattering.
translation.zh: 会有很多闲言碎语

translation.en: All that shit they was talking. All that shit they was talking.
translation.zh: 他们说的那些鬼话

translation.en: It's the type of guys we bring in.
translation.zh: 这就是我们会招募的人

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Come on, now. Hey, get inside. There you go! Nice one!
translation.zh: 快点 嘿 去里面 对了！好！

translation.en: [Josh] We don't have guys coming in from Tennessee, North Carolina,
translation.zh: 我们没有田纳西州 和北卡罗来纳州来的队员

translation.en: like some of the other junior colleges.
translation.zh: 这一点和一些其他大专院校不同

translation.en: [Nu'u] Nuts all over your face, boy!
translation.zh: 要你好看 伙计！

translation.en: Let's go, boy!
translation.zh: 走吧 小伙子！

translation.en: We're local East Bay.
translation.zh: 我们就是土生土长的东湾人

translation.en: Play with a chip on our shoulder and punch you in the mouth.
translation.zh: 随时准备干架 揍别人的脸

translation.en: [Nu'u] Rub my nuts all over his face.
translation.zh: 我要给他点颜色看看

translation.en: To some degree, it's hard to build a consistent culture
translation.zh: 某种程度上来说很难促成统一的文化

translation.en: because you are constantly having guys leave.
translation.zh: 因为时不时会有队员离开

translation.en: It's almost like guys are like mercenaries.
translation.zh: 感觉就像雇佣兵一样

translation.en: [Vince] You don't know who's gonna miss the bus.
translation.zh: 你不知道谁会错过旅程

translation.en: You don't know who's gonna get dropped from a class,
translation.zh: 不确定谁会辍学

translation.en: so every game is an adventure.
translation.zh: 所以每场比赛都是冒险

translation.en: [Coach Beam] No discipline.
translation.zh: 没有纪律

translation.en: What did I say not to do?
translation.zh: 我说过不能做什么？

translation.en: Bro, we got till Friday to fix some shit.
translation.zh: 老兄 周五之前我们得解决一些问题

translation.en: [Coach Beam] That's bullshit!
translation.zh: 什么玩意！

translation.en: You just got your ass kicked!
translation.zh: 你们刚被打得落花流水！

translation.en: That was embarrassing.
translation.zh: 太丢人了

translation.en: [Rejzohn] There, poor connection.
translation.zh: 猪肉好香

translation.en: -Let me see. I gotta get him back. -[video chat ringing]
translation.zh: 我看看 我得让他回来

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [chuckling] Look at that nigga's haircut.
translation.zh: 看看那黑哥的发型

translation.en: [Nahshon] All them new shirts y'all got, I need them.
translation.zh: 你的所有新衬衣 我都要了

translation.en: We got chicken on the back of them motherfuckers.
translation.zh: 背面都是小鸡 混蛋

translation.zh: 580下面是平原 上面是山丘

translation.en: Up here,
translation.zh: 在上面

translation.en: back in the '80s and '90s is where the Hells Angels hung out.
translation.zh: 这块区域在80和90年代 是地狱天使帮活跃的地带

translation.en: The Hells Angels actually have their headquarters in East Oakland.
translation.zh: 地狱天使的总部其实就在东奥克兰

translation.en: [Tammeil] When I was growing up, it had a persona of being
translation.zh: 在我成长的年代 它的形象是狂野

translation.en: rough, but also deep, beautiful and vibrant.
translation.zh: 狂野但深沉、美丽、蓬勃 （兰尼学院校长 塔梅尔吉克森）

translation.en: Oakland's very well known for the Black Panthers being founded here.
translation.zh: 奥克兰因为黑豹党在这里创建 而非常出名

translation.en: [singing] ♪ Black is beautiful ♪
translation.zh: 黑人很美

translation.en: [chanting] ♪ Free Huey! ♪
translation.zh: 释放修伊！

translation.en: [Lukas] Oakland has produced a lot of trailblazers.
translation.zh: 奥克兰产生了很多先驱

translation.en: People who have led movements who have led to huge innovations
translation.zh: （奥克兰为了孩子组织执行董事 卢卡斯布雷克米斯纳） 这里有人领导运动 引领巨大的创新

translation.en: and changes in how our society looks and feels.
translation.zh: 为社会带来变革

translation.en: I know from experience that the people can transform society
translation.zh: 我从经验中知道 人们可以改变社会

translation.en: and can surely free political prisoners and prisoners of war.
translation.zh: 肯定可以让政治犯和战犯重获自由

translation.en: [Coach Beam] You look at the talent that comes out of this city,
translation.zh: 看看从这座城市走出来的人才

translation.en: whether it's actors or singers or athletes.
translation.zh: 无论是演员、歌手还是运动员

translation.en: This city produces talented people.
translation.zh: 这座城市盛产人才

translation.en: [commentator] Rickey Henderson, no contest, steals third base.
translation.zh: 里奇亨德森 没有争议 盗三垒

translation.en: But Oakland has gone through this whole redevelopment and gentrification
translation.zh: 但是奥克兰可能在过去的十年间

translation.en: over the last, maybe, ten years.
translation.zh: 经历了再开发和高档化

translation.en: The black community's being forced out, moving further out into the suburbs.
translation.zh: 黑人社区被强制迁出 搬入更远的郊区

translation.en: More hipsters, yuppies moving into town.
translation.zh: 更多文青、雅皮士搬入城里

translation.en: In the '80s, you know, people didn't wanna live here.
translation.zh: 在80年代 人们不想住在这里

translation.en: Now, it's so gentrified, you're lucky to get a house for $800,000.
translation.zh: 现在这里变得很高端 花80万美金买下一幢房子都很幸运

translation.en: [Fred] You see all this construction? So they're changing Oakland.
translation.zh: 看到这些建设工地了吗？ 它们在改造着奥克兰

translation.en: Everything is being re-done.
translation.zh: （奥克兰警督 弗雷德谢维斯） 一切都重造了

translation.en: Oakland is gonna be a completely different city in five years.
translation.zh: 奥克兰五年内会变成完全不同的城市

translation.en: [Sakai] It's expensive to live here,
translation.zh: 在这里生活很贵

translation.en: it pushes those of us out that have been here forever
translation.zh: 因为昂贵的生活成本

translation.en: because of the cost of living here, along with the homelessness.
translation.zh: 一直在这里生活的我们被迫离开 还有无家可归的问题

translation.en: We have a lot of homeless people here.
translation.zh: 我们这有很多无家可归的人

translation.en: [Dorothy] Gentrification has really destabilized a lot of lives.
translation.zh: 社区高档化 让很多人的生活变得不稳定

translation.en: People feel vulnerable right now
translation.zh: 人们现在感觉很脆弱… （奥克兰历史学家 图书馆长 多萝西拉扎德）

translation.en: because of the volatility of our real estate market.
translation.zh: （奥克兰历史学家 图书馆长 多萝西拉扎德） 因为我们的不动产市场很多变

translation.en: A lot of people have moved out of the city which may impact students.
translation.zh: 很多人搬出了这座城市 这可能会对学生带来影响

translation.en: They have to commute from further away to get to school.
translation.zh: 他们上学的通勤距离变得更远

translation.en: [Tammeil] Across the faculty and the staff I know that everybody is
translation.zh: 我知道所有员工都多多少少

translation.en: grappling with how expensive it is to live here in the Bay area,
translation.zh: 在挣扎应对湾区高昂的生活成本

translation.en: how expensive it is to live in Oakland.
translation.zh: 奥克兰高昂的生活成本

translation.en: [Josh] It's been a lot more of a challenge.
translation.zh: 挑战越来越多

translation.en: If you pull up our roster, our guys aren't just from Oakland, California.
translation.zh: 拉出我们的队员名单 可以看到学生们不止来自加州奥克兰

translation.en: They're from anywhere BART goes.
translation.zh: 他们来自湾区地铁通达的各个地方

translation.en: You're taking guys that are going to school, working nights.
translation.zh: 这里的学生白天上学晚上打工

translation.en: I mean, you gotta be a tough son of a bitch to play this game.
translation.zh: 要打比赛的都是非常顽强的家伙

translation.en: [Coach Beam] We don't provide food, so they have to have jobs.
translation.zh: 我们不提供食物 所以他们必须工作

translation.en: So they work security, some drive Uber.
translation.zh: 他们有人做保安、开网约车

translation.en: One guy was picking up Lime scooters,
translation.zh: 有个学生收集青柠公司的滑板车

translation.en: and collecting and taking 'em back, and they get paid for moving those around.
translation.zh: 回收好送回去 可以拿到搬场费

translation.en: You find ways to get by in Oakland.
translation.zh: 总能找到在奥克兰生存的方法

translation.en: [Dior] Nigga, I'm starvin'.
translation.zh: 黑鬼 我饿死了

translation.en: Have we got an order for Will?
translation.zh: 收到威尔的订单了吗？

translation.en: Ten-piece classic combo, half barbecue, half lemon.
translation.zh: 十只装经典套餐 一半烧烤一半柠檬

translation.en: Another ten-piece classic combo, extra well done,
translation.zh: 另一份十只装经典套餐 焦香做法

translation.en: -lemon pepper and Louisiana rub. -Okay.
translation.zh: -柠檬胡椒和路易斯安那风味 -好

translation.en: Thank you, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Work night shift from 8:00 to 12:00. I'm trying to get on my own.
translation.zh: 晚班从8点到12点 我在努力自食其力

translation.en: I'm trying to tell people I can do this myself.
translation.zh: 我想告诉别人 我自己可以的

translation.en: I don't need no handouts.
translation.zh: 我不需要施舍

translation.en: Dior is resilient and he's had to be.
translation.zh: 迪奥很有韧性 他必须如此

translation.en: [Dior] I'm hella mad, I want something to eat.
translation.zh: 我快烦死了 我想吃东西

translation.en: He's an extremely sharp young man, but he's a battler.
translation.zh: 他是个很机敏的年轻人 但他是个战士

translation.en: I fucking hate this job.
translation.zh: 我讨厌这份工作

translation.en: It's the only way I get money right now.
translation.zh: 这是我现在赚钱的唯一方法

translation.en: So, I can't complain.
translation.zh: 所以我没法抱怨

translation.en: His high school senior year, he had to leave to go to Arkansas
translation.zh: 高三时 他不得不去阿肯色州上学

translation.en: to go to school and then come back. It's not been easy.
translation.zh: 然后又回来 这很不容易

translation.en: Some stuff happened, I moved to Arkansas with my mom,
translation.zh: 发生了一些事 我和妈妈搬去了阿肯色州

translation.en: so I couldn't showcase my skills for my senior year
translation.zh: 所以我没能在高三展现自己的技能

translation.en: and I had interest from Sac State,
translation.zh: 我本来有机会去萨克拉门托州立大学

translation.en: but they weren't interested in me no more.
translation.zh: 但他们对我失去了兴趣

translation.en: I had too much problems going on in my life.
translation.zh: 我生活中遇到了太多难题

translation.en: [Coach Beam] So many people have road blocks in their lives, right?
translation.zh: 很多人的人生中 都会遇到障碍 对吧？

translation.en: And when they see those road blocks, they give up and quit.
translation.zh: 他们看到这些障碍时会放弃

translation.en: He hasn't quit.
translation.zh: 但他没放弃

translation.en: [Dior] Hey, right now, my main focus is just having a school believe in me
translation.zh: 嘿 现在我的重心是 要让一家学校相信我

translation.en: to just pull the trigger on me.
translation.zh: 决定选择我

translation.en: Not no prefer walk-on, not no partial scholarship.
translation.zh: 不要优先替补位置 不要部分奖学金

translation.en: Give me a full ride and just believe me that I can produce for you.
translation.zh: 给我全奖 相信我能有所产出

translation.en: [Coach Beam] I'm serious about these grades.
translation.zh: 我是很严肃地在说这些成绩

translation.en: End of the day,
translation.zh: 到最后

translation.en: when Auburn calls to offer you a full scholarship and you can't leave?
translation.zh: 奥本大学打电话给你 为你提供全奖 结果你毕不了业？

translation.en: [Jeff] You gotta live in reality, guys.
translation.zh: 你们得认清现实 伙计们

translation.en: A lot of the times you guys live in a fantasy world,
translation.zh: 很多时候你们都活在幻想世界里

translation.en: two kinds of fantasies.
translation.zh: 两种幻想

translation.en: One, you think coaches are out to get you. Hold on.
translation.zh: （进攻协调员 杰夫哈根森） 第一 你们觉得教练们 会来找你们 等等

translation.en: That's one thing that you're wrong about.
translation.zh: 这是你们搞错的第一件事

translation.en: Second thing you're wrong about, if you don't face what's really going on,
translation.zh: 你们搞错的第二件事是 如果不面对现实

translation.en: it's not gonna affect you later.
translation.zh: 你们觉得现实以后就不会影响到你

translation.en: [Coach Beam shouts] Why are you talking when he's talkin'?
translation.zh: 他说话的时候你们为什么也在说？

translation.en: -[player] My apologies. -Sit down!
translation.zh: -对不起 -坐下！

translation.en: So, get that right. Live in reality.
translation.zh: 想清楚 认清现实

translation.en: If you're doing poorly in a class, you need to get extra help.
translation.zh: 如果你成绩不好 那就去补习

translation.en: There's the writing center, math center, accounting center,
translation.zh: 有写作中心、数学中心、会计中心

translation.en: all these places on campus, the library...
translation.zh: 学校里有这些资源 还有图书馆

translation.en: You guys ever heard of that?
translation.zh: 你们听说过吗？

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Many of you are here because you had bad habits in high school.
translation.zh: 你们很多人来这里 是因为高中习惯很差

translation.en: Well, we gotta change those habits.
translation.zh: 这些习惯要改掉

translation.en: There's two different ways.
translation.zh: 有两种不同的办法

translation.en: You've heard of the stick and the carrot, right?
translation.zh: 棍棒和胡萝卜 听过没？

translation.en: You put a carrot in front of a donkey,
translation.zh: 在驴子面前吊一根胡萝卜

translation.en: tie it on a stick in front of the donkey, it keeps walking,
translation.zh: 用棍子把它吊在驴子面前 驴子就会一直走

translation.en: trying to eat the carrot. Makes sense?
translation.zh: 想吃到胡萝卜 明白吗？

translation.en: The donkey moves forward, right?
translation.zh: 驴子向前走 对吧？

translation.en: Or you take a stick and you hit him.
translation.zh: 或者你可以拿棒子打它

translation.en: Donkey moves forward 'cause he doesn't wanna get hit.
translation.zh: 驴子因为怕被打所以向前走

translation.en: So the carrot is a $50,000 scholarship.
translation.zh: 胡萝卜就是五万美金的奖学金

translation.en: The stick is, you run every day, you don't play,
translation.zh: 棍子就是每天跑步 不能打比赛

translation.en: we take away playing time, right?
translation.zh: 剥夺上场时间 明白吗？

translation.en: What do you want?
translation.zh: 你们想要哪种？

translation.en: I would think that you'd want the carrot.
translation.zh: 我觉得你们会想要胡萝卜

translation.en: Hence, I eat carrots every day.
translation.zh: 所以我每天都吃胡萝卜

translation.en: [Judy] What did you think about what she was doing?
translation.zh: 你对她在做的事有什么想法？

translation.en: What did you write?
translation.zh: 你写了什么？

translation.en: So what I wrote for this chapter is Renee, she's the hook-up person.
translation.zh: （《纯洁心灵》 朱迪胡安妮塔） 这章我写的是 雷内 她是毒贩

translation.en: Renee would give groceries that would cost 100 bucks for 50 bucks.
translation.zh: （英语教师 朱迪胡安妮塔） 雷内想花50元来购买 本来价值100元的生活用品

translation.en: But why's she stealing when Renee be hooking it up?
translation.zh: 但她为什么 在雷内买毒品的时候偷拿呢？

translation.en: Well, if you look here, she thought she hooked her up,
translation.zh: 你看这里 她以为她在帮她买东西

translation.en: but then when she walked out, she was arrested.
translation.zh: 但她走出来时被捕了

translation.en: Damn.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: [Gianni] When she gets out of jail,
translation.zh: 后来她出狱

translation.en: she's now fully understanding that what she's doing,
translation.zh: 她没完全明白自己在做什么

translation.en: stealing and all this, it's not something her family raised her to do.
translation.zh: （练习球员 詹尼加拉维兹） 她家人可没教育她去偷东西

translation.en: -[Judy] You ever had a moment like that? -Like what?
translation.zh: -你经历过这种时刻吗？ -什么时刻？

translation.en: [Gianni] How your family works to get everything,
translation.zh: 你的家人工作换来报酬

translation.en: give you a certain type of life and then you do something
translation.zh: 给你提供某种生活 然后你做了些事情

translation.en: -to fuck that off? -Fuck it up?
translation.zh: -毁掉了这一切？ -毁掉？

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Gianni] Yeah.
translation.zh: -有过 -有过

translation.en: I've felt like that.
translation.zh: 我有过这种感觉

translation.en: [Nu'u] I wasn't good in high school.
translation.zh: 我在高中表现不好

translation.en: I didn't really take school or anything serious.
translation.zh: 我根本没把上学什么的当回事

translation.en: After school, I was just stacking boxes and I was just thinking,
translation.zh: 毕业后我搬箱子为生 我就想

translation.en: like, "This is not gonna be my career, I need a better career than this."
translation.zh: “这不是我想要的工作 我想要更好的工作”

translation.en: That's when they really showed me that football is my way out for school,
translation.zh: 那时候才有人告诉我 橄榄球可以帮我继续上学

translation.en: not the other way around.
translation.zh: 而不是反过来

translation.en: He's always wanted to play football so he can further his education,
translation.zh: 他一直想通过打橄榄球继续学业

translation.en: just to get something so he can support our family and, um...
translation.zh: 拿到点什么来支持家庭 （努的妻子 提亚道加瓦）

translation.en: Basically, make a living where we aren't struggling.
translation.zh: 过上我们不用太辛苦的生活

translation.en: [Nu'u] I haven't even been looking at the time.
translation.zh: 我都没在看时间

translation.en: [Tia] Come on. I'm gonna be late.
translation.zh: 快 我要迟到了

translation.en: -What happened? It was hella-- -Do you want me to do her or you got it?
translation.zh: -怎么了？刚才… -你要我来帮她还是你来？

translation.en: What's it need... Didn't she throw up or something?
translation.zh: 要怎么…她吐了还是怎么了？

translation.en: The yogurt. She got yogurt all over her.
translation.zh: 是酸奶 她身上都是酸奶

translation.en: You want Froot Loops, Eliyana?
translation.zh: 想吃水果谷物圈吗 艾莉亚娜？

translation.en: -No, I want-- -It's just Froot Loops, girl.
translation.zh: -不 我想… -就是水果谷物圈 宝贝

translation.en: Captain Crunch?
translation.zh: 脆脆队长？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Hey, there's no more Hamburger Helper.
translation.zh: 嘿 牛肉汉堡通心粉没有了

translation.en: I told you to make yours last night.
translation.zh: 我昨晚跟你说了 你的要自己做

translation.en: Dang.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: -You wanna take mine? -No, it's all right.
translation.zh: -要拿我的吗？ -不 没关系

translation.en: I have the Cup of Noodles at work.
translation.zh: 我工作的时候有泡面吃

translation.en: You be nice to Eliyana.
translation.zh: 你对艾莉亚娜要好点

translation.en: [interviewer] How old were you when Eliyana was born?
translation.zh: 艾莉亚娜出生时你多大？

translation.en: Seventeen.
Daddy, they got a cool couch.
translation.zh: 爸爸 他们的沙发好酷

translation.en: [Nu'u] It was crazy.
translation.zh: 当时太疯狂了

translation.en: I was crying the whole time she was born, but I wasn't yet...
translation.zh: 她出生时我一直在哭 但我还没…

translation.en: I was so scared to hold her.
translation.zh: 我…我害怕抱她

translation.en: I didn't wanna break her.
translation.zh: 我不想弄伤她

translation.en: So, I didn't even touch her until, I think, uh, that night.
translation.zh: 我记得直到那天晚上我才敢碰她

translation.en: I... I started holding her.
translation.zh: 我…我开始抱她

translation.en: It was the best feeling.
translation.zh: 那感觉是最棒的

translation.en: The best feeling ever, holding my little football.
translation.zh: 最棒的感觉 抱着我的小橄榄球

translation.en: [Eliyana] Daddy, Daddy.
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: I'm wrapped up like a burrito.
translation.zh: 我被裹得像个卷饼

translation.en: I can't get out.
translation.zh: 我出不来了

translation.en: [woman] Are those your siblings?
translation.zh: 她们是你妹妹吗？

translation.en: Who?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: [woman] The little ones.
translation.zh: 小宝宝们

translation.en: They're my daughters.
translation.zh: 她们是我女儿

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -是的

translation.en: I didn't know you had kids.
translation.zh: 我不知道你有孩子

translation.en: -Are you for real? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你认真的吗？ -是的

translation.en: [woman] That's crazy.
translation.zh: 太疯狂了

translation.en: [Nu'u] I didn't think I was ready,
translation.zh: 我觉得我没准备好

translation.en: but I took it on anyways 'cause it's my responsibility.
translation.zh: 但我还是承担下来了 因为这是我的责任

translation.en: Just being there 24/7.
translation.zh: 7天24小时时刻准备着

translation.en: That's all that matters.
translation.zh: 就是这样的

translation.en: Chill over here, okay?
translation.zh: 在这等一下 好吗？

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Bring 'em down.
translation.zh: 放倒他们

translation.en: Look what he did, you held him. Why are we doing this?
translation.zh: 看看他做了什么 你们抱住他 我们为什么这么做？

translation.en: We wanna hold people, right?
translation.zh: 我们要拦截对手 对吗？

translation.en: Get to the double. We can get in here.
translation.zh: 双人拦截 我们可以从这里进去

translation.en: This guy's not part of the run game.
translation.zh: 这个人没参与跑阵

translation.en: You can see how everything is a domino effect
translation.zh: 你们可以看到一旦有错误的操作

translation.en: if we don't do things correctly, okay?
translation.zh: 就会引发多米诺效应 明白吗？

translation.en: -We good? -[Robert] Yup.
translation.zh: -这个结束了？ -对

translation.en: [Coach Beam] All right, next.
translation.zh: 好 下一个

translation.en: All right, so, this is where I get frustrated--
translation.zh: 好了 这里我就很焦虑…

translation.en: -Boy, I will hurt you taking my carrots. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 小子 你要是拿我的胡萝卜我就揍你

translation.en: -[player] He wasn't trying to. -All you had to do is ask.
translation.zh: -他没想拿 -你只要问就可以

translation.en: Can I get one?
translation.zh: 我可以拿一个吗？

translation.en: No, you've tried to take my carrots.
translation.zh: 不 你刚想拿走我的胡萝卜

translation.en: You want a carrot? Yeah, you can have a carrot.
translation.zh: 你想要胡萝卜？好 你可以拿一个

translation.en: Don't be shy.
translation.zh: 别害羞

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 给

translation.en: Have my carrots.
translation.zh: 拿走我的胡萝卜

translation.en: -I want one. -[Coach Beam] All right, next.
translation.zh: 我就要一个 好了 下一个

translation.en: [Robert] RJ, your route's still too short.
translation.zh: 嘿 RJ 你的路线还是太短

translation.en: [RJ] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Don't be in a hurry with these routes.

translation.zh: 这是莫德斯托海盗队的第一档进攻

translation.en: [Rejzohn] Hey, shotgun, shotgun.
translation.zh: 嘿 霰弹枪

translation.en: [player] Go, boys, come on.
translation.zh: 上啊 小子们

translation.en: [commentator 1] Pistol formation.
translation.zh: 手枪阵

translation.en: He'll keep it himself, trying to get to the left side, he pump fakes.
translation.zh: 他自己留着 想去左边 假动作

translation.en: Makes the defender jump.
translation.zh: 防守球员跳起

translation.en: [Josh] What is he doing?
translation.zh: 他在干什么？

translation.en: [commentator 1] Touchdown!
translation.zh: 他达阵了！

translation.en: [player] What is he doing?
translation.zh: 他在干什么？

translation.en: [commentator 1] The Modesto Pirates come into Laney, take a two possession lead.
translation.zh: 莫德斯托海盗队直入兰尼 绝对优势领先

translation.en: Hey, come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 嘿 快 我们上

translation.en: [commentator 1] 33 to 20, the score.
translation.zh: 比分33比20

translation.en: I don't know why everybody's going down.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么大家情绪都低落了

translation.en: We still got hella time left.
translation.zh: 我们还有很多时间 老兄

translation.en: Keep the fucker in bounds and lots of air so Dior can just do what Dior does.
translation.zh: 把那混蛋控制在边界内 给迪奥腾出空间 让他发挥

translation.en: [commentator 1] Laney will need two touchdowns. They start this drive at the 42.
translation.zh: 兰尼需要再有两次达阵 他们这轮进攻从42码线开始

translation.en: [commentator 2] It's not over yet.
translation.zh: 还没结束

translation.en: [Rejzohn] Hey, we gotta score. We gotta get in the end zone, bro.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们要得分 得进入底线区 兄弟

translation.en: [commentator 1] They need to go 58 yards to the end zone.
translation.zh: 他们得推进58码进入底线区

translation.en: Mackey looking towards his way, he's in trouble...
translation.zh: 麦齐看向他的方向 他遇到麻烦…

translation.en: Caught by RJ Stern and he's just shy of midfield.
translation.zh: 被RJ斯登接住 他错过了中场区

translation.en: Nice job by Mackey to avoid the sack.
translation.zh: 麦齐做得好 避免了擒杀

translation.en: Mackey from the pocket, wants to screen, he's got blockers in front of him.
translation.zh: 麦齐从口袋出来 想要防护传球 他前面有阻挡

translation.en: Look out, that's Tidwell, Tidwell takes it inside the 40,
translation.zh: 小心 是提威尔 提威尔进入了40码线

translation.en: inside the 30 and down at the 28-yard line.
translation.zh: 进入30码线 到达28码线

translation.en: Good start for Laney on this drive,
translation.zh: 兰尼这轮进攻开头不错

translation.en: exactly what they needed, a couple of good plays.
translation.zh: 正是他们需要的 几次好进攻

translation.en: [player] Right spread!
translation.zh: 右侧散开！

translation.en: [commentator 1] Ball game, on the line, here's a pass down the middle of the field.
translation.zh: 持球待传 危险边缘 现在传球到中场

translation.en: There is a flag.
translation.zh: 旗子扬起

translation.en: [Coach Beam] Hey, doubles!
translation.zh: 嘿 双重犯规！

translation.en: [commentator 1] Pass interference on Modesto, that penalty obviously declined.
translation.zh: 对莫德斯托的巨大干扰 处罚显然被拒绝了

translation.en: -Hey, I need this, Dior, get it. -[Dior] I'm gonna score.
translation.zh: -嘿 我需要这个 迪奥 拿下它 -我会得分的

translation.en: -[Josh] Doubles! -[Coach Beam] Get over there.
translation.zh: -双重犯规！ -去吧

translation.en: -[player] Run. -[Josh] Run.
translation.zh: -跑 -跑

translation.en: [Josh] Doubles, doubles. Left side.
translation.zh: 双重犯规 左边

translation.en: Let's go! Silver Raiders! Silver Raiders!
translation.zh: 我们上！银色突击者！

translation.en: [commentator 1] Mackey against the blitz,
translation.zh: 麦齐应对突袭

translation.en: throws the slant and it's tipped and intercepted!
translation.zh: 斜投出手 指尖碰到 拦截了！

translation.en: Picked off by MJC, falls to the turf and that will do it.
translation.zh: 莫德斯托截下 掉在草皮上 这就够了

translation.en: The Pirates come into Laney College
translation.zh: 海盗队直入兰尼学院队

translation.en: and stun the defending national champions.
translation.zh: 打晕了想要卫冕的全国冠军

translation.en: Come here. Good job, it's fine, it's fine. Good job.
translation.zh: 过来 干得好 没事

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on.
translation.zh: 快

translation.en: [player] Fuck!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: [commentator 1] So the Eagles are upset here in the season opener,
translation.zh: 老鹰队本赛季开局低迷

translation.en: and a team that only lost two games last season
translation.zh: 上个赛季只输了两场比赛的队伍

translation.en: will lose their first of the year in their title defense.
translation.zh: 在今年的卫冕之路上 将输掉第一场比赛

translation.en: Modesto Junior College comes into Laney
translation.zh: 莫德斯托大专学校对战兰尼

translation.en: and pulls off a 33 to 20 victory over the Laney Eagles.
translation.zh: 33比20击败兰尼老鹰队

translation.en: We'll learn, we'll get better. That's it, we'll get better.
translation.zh: 我们会学习 会变好 就这样 我们会变好

translation.en: [commentator 2] You come into this as a defending national champion,
translation.zh: 你以守擂全国冠军的身份加入比赛

translation.en: you got a bullseye on your back...
translation.zh: 人人都盯着你

translation.en: and Modesto threw the dart right into the bullseye.
translation.zh: 莫德斯托给我们当头一击

translation.en: [player 1] Pick your heads up.
translation.zh: 抬起头来

translation.en: -Let's go. -[player 2] You got a whole season.
translation.zh: -你们还有一整个赛季 -走吧

translation.en: [Rejzohn] Stop being fucking lazy at practice.
translation.zh: 练习别再偷懒了

translation.en: This is why we fucking lost.
translation.zh: 所以我们才会输

translation.en: Everybody bullshit for weeks, and look what the fuck happened.
translation.zh: 一个个偷懒了好几周 看看结果如何

translation.en: It ain't gonna trouble to win a fucking day.
translation.zh: 赢一场比赛不好么

translation.en: It starts right now. I swear to God, it starts right now.
translation.zh: 从现在开始 我发誓

translation.en: Everyone better be on fucking time, better help their fucking ways,
translation.zh: 所有人最好都准时 最好用自己的方式努力

translation.en: everyone better go 100% every fucking practice,
translation.zh: 最好练习时都全力以赴

translation.en: 'cause look what the fuck happened.
translation.zh: 因为你们看看现在是什么结果

translation.en: No one's gonna be able to stay.
translation.zh: 没人能留下

translation.en: Stop all this bullshit!
translation.zh: 都别再吊儿郎当了！

translation.en: Gotta stay positive.
translation.zh: 要保持积极

translation.en: That's all I can say.
translation.zh: 我只能这么说

translation.en: I don't like thinking anything negative.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢消极的事物

translation.en: I'm already going through negative shit...
translation.zh: 我已经经历了消极的事情

translation.en: Why think negative? That's how you're gonna fail in life.
translation.zh: 为什么要有消极的想法？ 这样人生就会失败

translation.en: You know, if you think negative, you're gonna do negative.
translation.zh: 如果想法消极 行动也会消极

translation.en: I mean, I'm sleeping in my car, but... I'm still healthy.
translation.zh: 我是在车里睡 但…我还是很健康

translation.en: God gave me the gift to play football,
translation.zh: 上帝给了我打橄榄球的天赋

translation.en: and I love where I am, so I really can't complain.
translation.zh: 我喜欢自己现在的状态 所以我真的没法抱怨

translation.en: Do my mom know what's happening right now? No.
translation.zh: 我妈妈知道发生了什么吗？不知道

translation.en: Am I gonna tell her? No.
translation.zh: 我会告诉她吗？不会

translation.en: I don't need her stressing about me.
translation.zh: 我不需要她为我忍受压力

translation.en: She's got four other kids to worry about.
translation.zh: 她还要为其他四个孩子操心

translation.en: I don't need her stressing that her son is sleeping in a car.
translation.zh: 我不需要她担忧自己的儿子睡在车里

translation.en: She... I told her I'm sleeping at my friends,
translation.zh: 她…我跟她说我在朋友家过夜

translation.en: and she's okay with that, so I'm trying to just...
translation.zh: 她没意见 所以我就努力…

translation.en: I'm trying to help her out, too, 'cause I know...
translation.zh: 我也努力想帮她 因为我知道…

translation.en: I know the situation over there is not the best, too, so...
translation.zh: 我知道她那边情况也不好 所以…

translation.en: I figured I'd get my stuff.
translation.zh: 我还是去拿我的东西吧

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 可恶
